data.name: Witly - language tutoring in VR
data.detailed_description:
Witly offers personal language tutoring in virtual reality. Just schedule your lesson with a teacher and meet him face-to-face, even if they live on the other side of the world.

* Enjoy perfect social presence like in real-life, with added features that enhance your learning experience.

* Practice languages with native speakers from the comfort of your home, while feeling like they are in the same room with you.

* Learn at your own pace, get immediate feedback and all the help you need to improve your language skills.

* Available languages for now - English, Spanish, Russian, Latin, Japanese, Chinese.
data.about_the_game:
Witly offers personal language tutoring in virtual reality. Just schedule your lesson with a teacher and meet him face-to-face, even if they live on the other side of the world.

* Learn at your own pace, get immediate feedback and all the help you need to improve your language skills.

* Available languages for now - English, Spanish, Russian, Latin, Japanese, Chinese.
data.short_description: In Witly, you can learn languages with teachers in various environments. Each lesson lasts 60 minutes, free 10-minute trials are available!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
